caption.p: Vero cells treated with Glycyrrhizin highlight the importance of plant-derived compounds for COVID-19. (A) mock infected cells, (B) infected cells without treatment. (C) infected cells treated with 4000 mg/L glycyrrhizin. (D) infected cells treated with 1000 mg/L glycyrrhizin [Adopted from Cinatl et al. (2003b)].
